mapper.insert: insert into ad_promotion (id, appId, adPicPath, adPV, carouselPosition, startTime, endTime, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adpicpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adpv,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carouselposition,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update ad_promotion set appId = #{appid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, adPicPath = #{adpicpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adPV = #{adpv,jdbcType=BIGINT}, carouselPosition = #{carouselposition,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, appId, adPicPath, adPV, carouselPosition, startTime, endTime, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate from ad_promotion where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
